timeline.bodyText: Just curious what would it take to i18n this?
timeline.author: anistor

replies.bodyText: I guess we could have kept it in the Log interface, only with level DEBUG... I see we have plenty of those already.
replies.author: danberindei

replies.bodyText: Yes, that is a relic from the past that we must fix: debug messages should not be up for i18n
replies.author: tristantarrant

replies.bodyText: Right! Debug and trace messages should not be I18N.
replies.author: anistor
